page.title: 04"MY FARM LIFE" by R.Ellis.
page.content: I enjoy driving the tractors and I enjoy the harvest time because it's rewarding to see the crops that you planted come up as nice as they do. I help out by mucking out (YUK!),feeding the animals and by doing tractor work such as rotovating or ploughing,and I help by checking that the animals are O.K.. On the farm we keep sheep,lambs,cows and sometimes pigs.It's O.K. being a farm lad but I do get ratty when my mum and dad keep on telling me what to do.But the worst thing is getting up early on those cold winter mornings!
